data.name: Rhythm Knights Demo
data.detailed_description:
Play the demo to Rhythm Knights.

This demo features the first two levels and the bonus Friday Night Funkin' Battle V.S. Daddy Dearest!


Who is Dallen Larson?
Dallen Larson, born September 20, 2002, is a an American video game developer. He is best known for the hit indie rhythm game, Rhythm Knights.
